summary:
Real flight as Vampire Lord
Sprinting Version
descriptionHtml:
What is this mod not?
------------------------------
This mod is not near perfection in any kind, you can not fly in interiors because like any other flying mod (except \"platform trick\" mods like the broom mod) this mod has no collision while flying, but there is nothing we can do at the moment that adds perfect flight, i for myself do not care having no collisions in air, with what can you collide in air anyway.

What does this mod do?
-----------------------------------
This mod lets you fly as vampire lord and not only hover.

[Youtube]aSajBqyd7QM[/youtube][Youtube]DESW1_vNPfQ[/youtube]
                            [youtube]XA3OIpKtY4k[/youtube]


How to use?
-------------------
In Vampire form, go into the hover state and start springing (wing flapping on VL), as long as you spring you fly as soon as you stop sprinting you fall, but not to death, i removed falling damage while in Vampire Lord Form, and while you fly your stamina is infinite.


Future Plans?
--------------------
1.) Getting these damned collision to work...
2.) Maybe Doing a quest before flying is allowed.
3.) Any ideas from user would help advancing this mod


PS:
------------------------
If you like this mod, endorse it please, it does not hurt and helps me continuing my work :-)

Bugs?
--------------------
if you find any please report them, and do not report things like \"what? y u no haz collsions\".
author: Keldis
